text:
Grand Concourse, west side, north from but not including Van Cortlandt Ave., to and including East Mosholu Parkway South. Also shown is the elevated structure of the I.R.T. Van Cortlandt Park subway line running on Jerome Ave.

May 8, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Van Cortlandt Avenue

text:
Grand Concourse, west side, north from but not including Van Cortlandt Ave., to and including East Mosholu Parkway South. Also shown is the elevated structure of the I.R.T. Van Cortlandt Park subway line running on Jerome Ave.

title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Van Cortlandt Avenue

text:
Van Cortlandt Avenue, west from Grand Concourse to Jerome Avenue (I.R.T. elevated structure thereon), showing the thoroughfare after it had been repaved by the W.P.A.

Jan. 27, 1937

W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs Project
title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Avenue - Grand Concourse

text:
St. George's Crescent (running from center of view to background), south from Grand Concourse. The view is from the N.W. corner of the Concourse and Van Courtlandt Avenue.

May 5, 1938.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Bronx: St. George's Crescen - Grand Concourse
